Tapas, tostas y raciones

A casual meal for eat at anytime and enjoy the specialties of El Yate

Tapas

  • Medallion of de-boned bull's tail & apple sauce – 5,50€
  • Mini hamburger sirloin and caramelised onion – 1,75€ / unit price
  • Hamburger "Yate" (250 gr of veal, bacon, brie y caramelised onion) – 9€
  • Charcoal grilled octopus with paprika oil, diced potatoes & fried small green peppers "Padrón" – 7,50€
  • Wild mushrooms fried in breadcrumbs & oil and garlic mayonnaise – 5,50€
  • Croquettes (varied) – 1,50€ / unit price
  • Tender grilled cuttlefish delights with salad & oil and garlic mayonnaise– 6,50€
  • Fried sliced aubergines with sugar cane honey – 5,50€
  • Spanish broken eggs with ham and matchstick potatoes – 6€
  • Varied grilled vegetables with goat's cheese – 6,75€
  • Artichoke hearts with slivers of ham – 6€
  • Pastry cones filled with leek and cheese sauce with Port wine – 5,50€
  • Crunchy chicken fingers with Porto wine – 6€
  • Mini medallions of sirloin with sweet mustard – 5€
  • Tempura-fried vegetables with a reduction of balsamic vinegar – 6€

Tostas (Toast)

  • Spanish ham: ham, olive oil and fresh tomato spread – 3,75€
  • Tuna loin: tuna loin, green "Piquillo" peppers and sliced tomato – 4€
  • Anchovies: on a thin layer of honey – 4,50€
  • "Marriage": soused (vinegar) and salted anchovies on sliced tomato – 4,50€
  • Imitations elvers with salmon: oil & garlic mayonnaise, elvers in garlic & smoked salmon – 4,50€
  • "Country toast": fresh tomato spread ("tumaca"), spanish ham & french omelette – 4,50€
  • Red meat: Veal sirloin, foie paté and a reduction of Pedro Ximenez wine – 5€
  • Goat's cheese: grilled rolled goat's cheese, tomato jam and paprika from Vera– 4,50€
  • "Popular": pork sirloin, caramelised onion and grilled brie – 4,75€

Raciones (plate-sized)
